str.name: Subject: Authentication your identity with codes PIN1 and PIN2
this letter approves the succefful creation of mojeID account with these dates:

strings.str: this letter approves that mojeID account was successfully created for you with these data:

str.name: To access into your mojeID account is necessary to verify your identity with a pair of pins PIN1 and PIN2:

strings.str: Enter PIN1 and PIN2 codes to activate your account.

str.name: PIN1 was sent to your email address
For activate your account click on a link you received by email.

strings.str: To activate your account click on the link you received by email.

str.name: We wish you much pleasure when you use the service mojeID.

strings.str: We wish You pleasant use of mojeID service.

str.name: Authentication new owner of account mojeID
For full activation of the following account

strings.str: For full activation of the following account:

str.name: To complete full activation of your account, go to

strings.str: To complete full activation of your account, go to

str.name: log into your mojeID profile and enter the code PIN3 at the initial screen.

strings.str: log into your mojeID profile and enter the code PIN3 at the initial screen.
